name: Robo-Cup
description:
Meet Robo-Cup,  a next-gen beverage holding machine that can kick ass and serve drinks. However, before he could be unveiled at the 5031st International Water Expo, his owner was assassinated by the CEO of a disposable water bottle company and he was thrown into the sea. Now Robo-Cup must fight his way out of islands of Plastic Bottles to make it to the Expo in time.

Credit to SollyBunny for helping me with the pygame to EXE conversion. I know it didn't work out but thanks for trying :).

(BTW, sorry for the weird file name. Was in a rush and forgot to change it)

This game was written in 100% python. I still feel the pain.
